name: Zip Ties
effect: One action to apply. FORCE roll to break free.

name: Standard Handcuffs
effect: One action to apply. FORCE roll with disadvantage to break free.

name: Glue Medical Adhesive
effect: Advantage to MEDICAL AID roll for first aid on Broken individual.

name: Surgeon's Field Kit
effect: Advantage to MEDICAL AID roll to stabilize a lethal critical injury.

name: Instant Fix
effect: Health pill, decontamination pill, and painkiller. Immediately heals a point of Health. Only one use per Shift.

name: Soviet Happy
effect: Happy pills. Immediately heals one point of Resolve. Only one use per Shift.

name: Ko-Kuma
effect: Energy drink.

name: Experience
effect: Light narcotic.

name: ZLLSH
effect: Hard narcotic. No skills rolls can be made for a Shift after use.

name: Biometric Reader
effect: Enables proximity and touch personal identification.

name: Ocular Implant
effect: Advantage to OBSERVATION in darkness. KIA uplink.

name: Cochlear Implants
effect: Augments natural hearing capabilities. Advantage to OBSERVATION when listening.

name: Prosthetic Arm
effect: Stronger bones and muscles. Advantage to FORCE when using arm strength, base Damage 2 for unarmed attacks.

name: Prosthetic Leg
effect: Stronger bones and muscles. Advantage to MOBILITY when running or jumping.

name: Synaptic Implants
effect: Augments synaptic reflexes from spinal cord. Draw an extra initiative card at the start of combat and choose which to use.

name: Grenade
effect: Can be thrown up to MEDIUM range. Explosion causes piercing damage.

name: Explosive C
effect: Cannot be thrown. Explosion causes piercing damage.

name: Explosive B
effect: Cannot be thrown. Explosion causes piercing damage.

name: Explosive A
effect: Cannot be thrown. Explosion causes piercing damage.

name: Tear Gas Grenade
effect: Can be thrown up to MEDIUM range. All in the zone must roll STAMINA (no action) on their turn or lose their action. Lingers D6 rounds.

name: Flashbang Grenade
effect: Can be thrown up to MEDIUM range. All in the zone must roll OBSERVATION (no action) or lose their next turn.

name: Sonic Grenade
effect: Can be thrown up to MEDIUM range. Explosion causes crushing damage.

name: Sonic Charge
effect: Cannot be thrown. Explosion causes crushing damage.
